title: Samurai.I.Musashi.Miyamoto.1954.DVDRip.x264.AC3-[gx]
description:
Synopsis: Hiroshi Inagaki's acclaimed Samurai Trilogy is based on the
novel that has been called Japan's Gone with the Wind. This sweeping
saga of the legendary seventeenth-century samurai Musashi Miyamoto
(powerfully portrayed by Toshiro Mifune) plays out against the turmoil
of a devastating civil war. The Trilogy follows Musashi's odyssey from
unruly youth to enlightened warrior. In the first part, Musashi
Miyamoto, the hero's dreams of military glory end in betrayal, defeat,
and a fugitive lifestyle. But he is saved by a woman who loves him and
a cunning priest who guides him to the samurai path. This installment
won the 1955 Academy Award for Best Foreign Film.

IMDb: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0047444/
IMDb Rating: 7.7/10 (2,344 votes)

Directed by: Hiroshi Inagaki
